list_id.title: List ID
list_id.description: The unique list id for the category.

id.title: Category ID
id.description: The id for the interest category.

title.title: Name
title.description: The text description of this category. This field appears on signup forms and is often phrased as a question.

display_order.title: Display Order
display_order.description: The order that the categories are displayed in the list. Lower numbers display first.

type.title: Display Type
type.description: Determines how this categoryâ€™s interests appear on signup forms.

_links.title: Links
_links.description: A list of link types and descriptions for the API schema documents.

items.title: Resource Link
items.description: This object represents a link from the resource where it is found to another resource or action that may be performed.

rel.title: Rel
rel.description: As with an HTML 'rel' attribute, this describes the type of link.

href.title: Href
href.description: This property contains a fully-qualified URL that can be called to retrieve the linked resource or perform the linked action.

method.title: Method
method.description: The HTTP method that should be used when accessing the URL defined in 'href'.

targetSchema.title: Target Schema
targetSchema.description: For GETs, this is a URL representing the schema that the response should conform to.

schema.title: Schema
schema.description: For HTTP methods that can receive bodies (POST and PUT), this is a URL representing the schema that the body should conform to.
